a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: People living in countries that have universal voting rights, World
This does not consider elections being postponed, informal restrictions on voting rights, or legal restrictions
based on age, criminal conviction, disability, or local residency.
World – Universal right to vote for men
World – No data on right to vote
World – No universal right to vote
World – Universal right to vote for men
Data source: Skaaning et al. (2024); Population based on various sources (2024)
